mapper.update: update ${db}.ship_address set recent = 1 where no=#{vo.no} and member_no=#{no};
update ${db}.stock set stock = stock- #{amount} where no=#{stockNo};
mapper.select: select b.no as no , b.name as name, b.parents_no as parentsNo from ${db}.category a,${db}.category b where a.no=b.parents_no and a.no=#{category}
select * from (select ifnull(count(rate),0) as cnt,ifnull(avg(rate),0) as rate,ifnull(item_no,#{no}) as item_no from ${db}.item_review where item_no=#{no}) a, ${db}.item b where a.item_no=b.no;

choose.when: select a.amount ,a.no from ${db}.cart a ,${db}.stock b where a.stock_no=b.no and a.member_no=#{memberNo} and b.first_option = #{firstOption} and b.second_option is NULL and b.item_no=#{itemNo} and a.member_no=#{memberNo}
choose.otherwise: select a.amount ,a.no from ${db}.cart a ,${db}.stock b where a.stock_no=b.no and a.member_no=#{memberNo} and b.first_option = #{firstOption} and b.second_option = #{secondOption} and b.item_no=#{itemNo} and a.member_no=#{memberNo}

choose.when: select no from ${db}.stock where item_no=#{item_no} and first_option=#{firstOption} and second_option is NULL;
choose.otherwise: select no from ${db}.stock where item_no=#{itemNo} and first_option=#{firstOption} and second_option=#{secondOption}

mapper.select: select a.no,a.code,a.name,a.now_price as nowPrice,a.sale , a.main_image , b.first_option,b.firstOptionName,b.second_option , b.secondOptionName, b.cartNo,b.amount from ${db}.item a, ( select a.no,a.item_no,a.first_option,a.firstOptionName,a.second_option,a.secondOptionName,b.no as cartNo,b.amount from ( select a.no,a.item_no,a.first_option,a.firstOptionName, a.second_option,b.name as secondOptionName from ( select a.no , a.item_no,a.first_option, b.name as firstOptionName, a.second_option ,a.stock from ${db}.stock a, ${db}.option b where a.first_option= b.no) a , ${db}.option b where a.second_option = b.no) a , ${db}.cart b where a.no=b.stock_no and member_no=#{memberNo}) b where a.no=b.item_no;

select a.no,a.code,a.name,a.now_price as nowPrice,a.sale , a.main_image , b.first_option as firstOption,b.firstOptionName,b.second_option as secondOption, b.secondOptionName, b.cartNo,b.amount from ${db}.item a, ( select a.no,a.item_no,a.first_option,a.firstOptionName,a.second_option,a.secondOptionName,b.no as cartNo,b.amount from ( select a.no,a.item_no,a.first_option,a.firstOptionName, a.second_option,b.name as secondOptionName from ( select a.no , a.item_no,a.first_option, b.name as firstOptionName, a.second_option ,a.stock from ${db}.stock a, ${db}.option b where a.first_option= b.no) a , ${db}.option b where a.second_option = b.no) a , ${db}.cart b where a.no=b.stock_no and member_no=#{memberNo}) b where a.no=b.item_no and b.cartNo=#{cartNo}
select no,ship_name as shipName, phone_number as phoneNumber , address,recent,member_no as memberNo from ${db}.ship_address where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: delete from ${db}.cart where member_no=#{userNo} and no=#{cartNo};
